item.title: [Python] With VS Code's SSH connection function, edit and debug the code in Raspberry Pi
item.description: What is #VSCode? Abbreviation for source code editor “Visual Studio Code” developed by Microsoft. As a free, lightweight, and multifunctional editor, it is rapidly gaining popularity. From 2019/10 edition, SSH connection function to RaspberryPi (ARM v8) is officially supported, so I wrote the result of trying remote editing of Python code in Raspberry Pi. ** In conclusion, we were able to achieve debugging with breakpoints and a comfortable remote development environment!
